caption: The food was very good. Great service too.
Food was delicious, the wait staff was very attentive, however, there was no social distancing between tables.

Walked in on a busy friday night with no reservation. The manager said they were able to accommodate us for 1 hr. The ambience, staff, and food were amazing. They ended up having extra tables open so we got to stay longer than 1 hr. We felt like VIP (next to dj). I tried greek food at athena and wasn't impressed (too earthy). I had a 4 course meal here and everything was DELICIOUS!! the frappe martini is amazing too and all affordable. 5 stars all around. Thank you so much!
Came for restaurant week 2021, and everything was delicious! Service was great as well
Great outdoor dining setup on Huron.  Excellent server staff!  Cocktails were delicious but small servings.

The Greek Fries are fire! I would definitely go back the lamb burger is next on my list! I will review again then as I'm not sure this review is the best seeing as it was St. Paddy's Day weekend and everything was a cluster but the team seemed to handle it very well!
The food was amazing and the service was excellent! We'll definitely be returning soon
great food service ambiance 5 out of 5
Lovely outdoor space. It was great to get together with vaccinated friends. Great service and tasty food.
Really good food! Loved the restaurant, very cute inside. Drinks were fun and shared a bunch of apps which was the perfect amount. There’s this cheese skillet on the small plates, wow, get that.
Good food, nice location
The food was GREAT and very fresh.  Service was a bit lacking only because our server was missing for a large block of time, but I would definitely return!
Horrible place, expensive and not good food, don’t bring you even your bread before or all the menu says
Dry
Evlogimenos soup was outstanding!

Excellent meal for my husband's birthday!  I have multiple dietary issues and the staff here at Avli went out of their way to feed me well.  It is very difficult to eat out and this delicious meal was such a treat!

We had Saturday lunch here. When we arrived there were so many customers. We ordered 3plates. Each dish had huge volume and really good. Staffs were nice but a young male server took my order wrong and they served Roast chicken plate instead of chicken souvlaki plate,which I initially ordered.

My entire review just got deleted so Rewriting. The stars are based on the food/drinks/service. The “small plates” are not small at all; kinda wish our server had warned us after we ordered 4. We couldn’t even finish those so we didn’t order entrees after that. The tomato keftedes were so good and the zucchini chips too. I would order those to go next time. The margarita was just ok. The hummus was bland. Server was good.  FYI - covid is still a thing & there is no social distancing here. Every table was filled on the first floor + at the bar. We sat upstairs and every table was filled. Plus the tables were so close to each other that on several occasions people walking passed bumped into our table, our dishes & us. It was hot and there wasn’t much ventilation in there. I’ll wait till I’m vaccinated to come back.
Awesome!!

Lovely lunch today in their "outdoor" space. It was a beautiful sunny day and the covered/enclosed patio was warm (though there were heaters, we did not need them).  The occupied tables were plenty distant from each other, and the servers and staff were well masked, but still friendly and helpful. It was our first time in a restaurant since July, and Avli didn't disappoint us. As someone who lives back and forth between Greece and Chicago, I'm pretty picky about Greek food - we were really impressed with several small plates (mezes) including the saganaki (which isn't something we would order, but the figs intrigued us and we were so glad we chose it), and the kataifi shrimp was perfect. We were happy to enjoy a plate of zucchini chips with skordalia (garlic sauce) - the best we've experienced outside of Greece (actually, the chips were the best we've eaten anywhere!) All in all, a safe happy space for a long overdue lunch out.

Solid meal overall. Saganaki was surprisingly good - I really enjoyed the unique addition of peppered figs. Both the short rib and lamb shoulder were tender and hearty dishes, though not especially flavorful. Service was very attentive and helpful.

I went to Avli River North last night for my cousin's birthday.  The minute my group and I walked inside, I felt like I was transported back to pre-COVID times (with the exception of masks that were not even worn properly by the staff).  I understand that indoor dining in Chicago just opened up, but it was very clear that Avli's ownership had no regard to the city's rules and regulations.  The place was PACKED.  We asked to sit outside on their heated patio but was told that the wait would be very long.  Since we had already been waiting over 45 minutes for our 7:30 reservation, my group and I decided to settle on the next available table  -- which was wedged between two other packed tables and was an arms-reach by the (mask-less) DJ.  The bar was packed.  The first floor was packed.  The staff (bartenders and servers alike) would take off their masks to speak to one another and then put them back on once they were done.  The man who I presume was the Chef and/or owner of the restaurant walked through the restaurant greeting guests -- completely mask-less.  And on top of all the blatant disregard for the health of their customers - and one another, for that matter - it took awhile for our server to ask for our drinks/food, it took awhile for our drinks and food to get to our table and it then felt like the busboys were trying to get us out of there ASAP to make room for the next party.  I was extremely disappointed in this restaurant.  There is a way to operate a restaurant safely during COVID times and this was not it.
My new favorite place! Great vibes here! The food was delicious and the service was great 😋

We got some takeout from Avli and the food was delicious. We got the ratatouille, hummus, and the stuffed eggplant dish. Everything was so good and the portions were very big. The menu seems very vegan/vegetarian friendly.
Great

Very good service, good modern Greek food. Really one of the best Greek restaurants we’ve tried in Chicago. Great cocktails too and good selection of Greek wines! Nice atmosphere, but that weird loud club music that was on every time we visited is the one thing I personally don’t like about this place. Tirokafteri 10/10! Tarama 6/10 Melitzanosalata 6/10 Moussaka 8/10 Lamb shoulder 9/10 Burger 9/10 Monastiraki style gyros 7/10 Kataifi prawns 9/10 Saganaki 7/10 Locaniko 7/10 Diana salad 8/10 Trellis cocktail 10/10 Mulled wine 10/10 Wine suggestion: malagousia gerovassiliou and xinomavro alpha estate 👌🏼
Service and setting are good, saganaki is ok however the remainder of the food is bad quality: crispy brussel sprouts isn't anything crispy and meats and pasta are all overcooked.

Ordered out from Avli during covid to try and support local restaurants. Got an underwhelming portion salad (2 cucumbers, a couple pieces of lettuce and piece of feta) and an underwhelming dinner. Won’t be ordering from here again. If you’re looking to get people to order out, at least give them serving portions that are worth it.
Good restaurant, good service, good food. They really need to turn the music down on the patio area. Could barely hear the person sitting across from me at dnr.
I can’t rave enough about the friendly service from Alex our waiter. The menu has authentic dishes with a twist. They brought me a delicious dessert wine for my birthday too!
Great food with fabulous warm outdoor dining.
Best lambchops i've ever had. Saganaki appetizer is top notch.
Lobster pasta is delicious!! Great lamb chops as well. Picked up dinner for New Year's eve.

When you see so many good reviews and you expect the place with 4.5 star rating to be very good, you get disappointed. Non of the dishes we tried besides roasted eggplant were good. The prices are way too high for the "experience " there's nothing special.  The hamburger was dry and looked horrible,  my roasted vegetables were covered in oil.  Disappointed.
The bartender Bobby is awesome! Nikko the server too!! Yams for an awesome Christmas dinner guys!

Good social distancing, Greek food menu is a little atypical and very good, partially open patio only open on one end but I felt lots of breeze and a number of ceiling fans circulating. While it was warm enough to take off our coats, I had to put my winter hat back on (not complaining as I prefer air circulation to keep me feeling safe). The augolemono was to die for and HOT...usually you get lukewarm this was the perfect temp. Someone in our group had the seafood platter and loved it but left the accompanying side salad, I took that home and it was so good...it had some sort of couscous. Very interesting cocktails. I may return just for those. Interesting take on moussaka personally I prefer the traditional but if you like lamb you'll really like it - gives it a more comfort food flavor.
Food is really good, love the lemon soup! Pleasant outside dining area, service is good.

the watermelon salad is beyond to die for, especially if you add chicken. the seafood platter was amazing as well. the staff were extremely nice and the food hadn’t taken long. definitely one of my new favorite restaurants.
Better than i expected and the food was good and the outdoor setup is quite COVID appropriate. Service was very good as well and contactless payment was a plus.
Delicious authentic Greek food

This past Saturday evening I walked here by myself and was happily surprised that they had an available table for me!  I guess I got lucky and this was my first (but not last) visit to this charming taverna.  The atmosphere here at Avli is low key, inviting, friendly and completely breathtaking.  The interior of the restaurant is well organized, brightly lit and designed beautifully.  The outside dining was just as lovely cozy and inviting with the heating furnaces to keep everyone warm and toasty.  I ordered an artisinal lamb meat burger with their homemade feta cheese spread and Greek fries with crumbled feta cheese.  The burger was generously sized and the gourmet spread goes extremely well with both the burger and fries.  As you are seated your server will bring you your own pitcher of water and two slices of homemade bread with Greek olives.  I thought everything tasted so fresh and full of lively flavors to tease your palette. It's obvious to me that the food is prepared with love so kudos to the chef for authentic Greek cuisine.  The waitstaff here is super friendly, efficient and attentive to your needs and even the manager came directly to my table to make sure I was okay.  The outside set up is so beautiful and honestly the warming heaters were so hot I was able to dine outside without needing to wear my coat.  I know dining outside might seem daunting in our colder winter season; but I truly felt comfortable here because the space heaters did their job!  There was so much food I even brought a large portion for my canine and I to share this afternoon and she also gave Avli 5 🐾 paws up. I'm thanking the entire staff for providing me with such excellent food and service 🙌
My lamb was delicious. Staff was very nice.
Amazing happy hour deals, food is great too.
Great spot for brunch . They are strictly maintaining social distancing. They have open patio. And their heaters are really keeping in warm inside even in a cold morning.

One word. EXCEPTIONAL. My sisters and I went for happy hour and they not only were attentive but also had exceptional food. They made us feel like we were family and gave us top notch service. This will forever be my go-to. I would recommend Avli to anyone.

My boyfriend and I eat here at least once a week when in Chicago, and it's not even in Greektown! They have good outdoor seating with plenty of heaters. My personal favorites are the taramasalata, gigantes, and lemon soup. The taramasalata with pita bread is honestly enough for a meal, it's so delicious.

BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE! I would like to bring this to the attention of the owner and the GM. My name is James, I'm Greek Canadian, I speak Greek but I don't look Greek. I've been to your River North location numerous times. I usually come on Mondays. Good food, good service and a wonderful host.  My problem has to do with the host on weekends and his unacceptable behavior. An angry middle-aged grey-haired host with no manners! I've been two times on a Saturday night and both times I've experienced the same thing. The way he approaches the tables and speaks to customers is unacceptable! Both times I've been seated on Wells St. I like it because it's more quiet and reminds me of a platia(town centre). The first time the host was yelling to our waitress and the second time to the customers. The last time there were three women sitting at a table beside us. The host told them in a loud tone of voice to finish their wines because he needed the table. Not even five minutes later he came back in a very angry mood and told the ladies that they needed to go even though they hadn't finished their wine and he stood there until they left. He even called a busser to clean their table and place new mats even though the table was occupied. The people from the surrounding tables were in shock. On his way back to his host stand he pointed at our table and literally screamed to the waitress "dioxtous"(kick them out). The young lady looked scared. What business in the world accepts and applauds such a behavior.  I have sent Avli 5 emails so far and they totally ignored me. The reason I'm posting this here is because I want to see if they will ignore my review. This past Saturday, my daughter and her friends were at Avli and they had a similar experience. The same guy told them that they needed to finish with their drinks and go. When my daughter told him that they've already ordered more drinks and needed more time, he looked upset and told her that he doesn't care and he wants the table. Who is this guy? Is he more than a host? Is he a part owner? On their website they're talking about philoxenia (an act of hospitableness and welcome). I'm sorry but this is not Philoxenia! This is bad customer service, unprofessionalism and disrespect!

We came to Avli River Northn on a warm Sunday. Their outdoor area is very nice and perfect for safe dining during covid. The server was very friendly and attentive. We got the roasted eggplant for a starter which was delicious. I had the breakfast platter which came with several small items such as toast, sweet cookies, amazing marmalade, eggs, bacon. My husband had the lamb burger which he said was delicious. And my friend had a salad with chicken kebabs and she raved about them. This was a solid brunch, also with good $8 mimosas. I def will be back to try the dinner menu.
Chef Dimitri out did himself congrats also to Lou Kanelis.  Great food great service.  Deserts coffees entries all rock. Loved the pork Gyro ❤ I must experience.

Greek food at this place - very good. It's so tasty. Had a friend come into town and asked me to take him here again. The place has a cool atmosphere. Feels similar to a restaurant in New York I loved.
Great food and place, the staff was wonderful.

One of the best restaurants in the city of Chicago. I’m not only talking about their delicious authentic Greek food, it takes more than that to reach this level of success. Stefanios is instrumental as a manager he’s the person who will ensure that you don’t walk away dissatisfied of anything and will make your experience a memorable one. With servers as great as Kyriakos he’s on top of everything  no matter how big the party is, he’s got it! Thank you Avli Rivernorth team for everything you do.
Excellent spot for quality greek food. everyone at our table was enjoying everything. the staff was sociable and attentive. kinda of like a cafe in phoenix that i enjoyed.
The food lacked flavor and kick. Was expecting more. Meh.
This place is fantastic. Awesome Greek food...lamb shoulder is the best. Service is always great...one of the few places that has energy even w Covid.  Can't wait to go back!
A preferred spot for delicious Greek food. Excellent spot to spend time alone or talk business. The service here is attentive. Bring your hunger - portions are generous.
Excellent
Delicious seafood.
I felt like I was transported to Mykonos. Amazing food and decently priced for River North

Disappointed. The food was mediocre. Pita was cold. Octopus was cold and tasteless.  Lamb burger were overcooked and surprisingly still cold. Cocktail was not impressive. Honestly Naf Naf tastes better.

The service was fair. The portions were small. I do not necessarily have to eat bigger portions every time I go out & spend money. If I do go iyt, I want the meal to be worth it. This time, spending the money was not worth it. I ordered the watermelon salad with an addition of salmon. They gave me smoked lox for an additional $7.00! I can buy a lox or gravlax at whole foods for. I was expecting the cook or chef to roast or bake the salmon. It was a joke. If I go there again, I will try another item but will never go again there for brunch.
Ok place for Greek food.

Came here for happy hour and their lovely outdoor space.  However, the server was not very friendly/outgoing, and the food was insanely mediocre.  The eggplant dip, octopodi and beets were virtually tasteless.  At least they cooked our lamb well.  Too much good food in the city to return here.
Amazing space and atmosphere. Amazing happy hour deals. You feel as if you stepped right onto a greek island. Well done!

This place feels like Greece with amazing food and service. It's a great twist to the authentic greek cuisine making you feel like you're on an exotic vacation. DJ spinning outside is the cherry on top! Great job Lou!!
(Translated by Google) good to eat  (Original) 好吃
A great place! Yummy food 🥘 it makes me feel happy !

I've been here before and had wonderful experiences but this time was a bust. The atmosphere and the food was amazing as always, but a huge con was our waiter Fotoni. The service was terrible, slow and she was very rude. I was very disappointed with her behavior.

We were looking forward to trying this place but found hair in our food and our waitress was so not helpful in going over the menu. Food was ok except for the hair. I wonder if the the Lincoln park location is better. They have a beautiful outdoor space though!!

Had a reservation, had to wait to get seated. Sat at the worst table possible surrounded by large, loud parties. Server didn't give any suggestions and was very short with us, never even trying to get us to order anything. Saganaki was warm but not hot, octopus was well cooked but not the freshest. Menu was hard to understand especially with no guidance from our server.
Who would give this place more than 1 star? Best thing was location. Food and drinks were honestly disgusting and not up to par whatsoever. Would never go back.
Excellent Greek food
Excellent food and services!!
Get the lobster spaghetti

The food is excellent here, but the service was really bad. We arrived on time for our 8pm reservation only to find about ten other parties also waiting for tables. We weren't sat down until about 8:20 and then had to ask for a waiter to come take our drink order after another 20 mins of sitting down. Once we were assigned a waiter things improved a lot - the service was much better and food was great, but the initial experience of having to wait and be seated was a pain.  I'd still recommend going because the food really was excellent. Very authentic Greek food, great quality and presentation. Solid drinking options also.

We had a great experience eating at Avli in January, and after COVID hit, we’ve ordered from the, a couple of times and it’s been great every time. Their Easter menu was fantastic, and since then, they’ve opened up their regular menu for ordering as well.
greek food and the feeling at this location is super good. I look forward to a return trip.
Amazing
I wanted to love this restaurant.   But I just couldn't.   It was so expensive and so average that this the best rating I can give.  On the other hand,  the service was great.

Avlí did a great job with making the whole environment look lively and safe for everyone to stay socially distanced. The appetizers and main dishes were great. Highly recommended the red wines and gyro plate.
favorite restaurant in Chicago!

This has been a great experience. They really take good care of their guests. When it started raining they brought out umbrellas and brought people under the awning. The happy hour specials are hard to beat. Very good selection of wines and cocktails and comprehensive Greek well thought out menu. We will come back for sure.
I have never been anywhere in the world where they serve you the starter and the main course at the same time, without you asking for it. So out of touch
Just ok, a bit over priced ive had better Greek food .service was good .
The food was amazing! I go to Greece every summer and the food was as close to being there as you can get. The service was great too. We will definitely be coming back!
Food is just ok... I had the lamb shoulder which was $29 and it just treat mediocre.

The food was very good and the service too. The reason that I’m rating with only one star is because of the bartender with the name “Damianos”. I came to Avli with my wife and some other friends, when my wife went to the bathroom Damianos asked her to drink some shots with her and also he kept pushing her to go out with her when she already explained to him that she has a husband and she doesn’t want the shots neither to go out. Although he started looking at her very aggressive and in a sexiest way. This was very bad experience while there was no management at this point to do something. Avli you have such a better employees so you don’t need a person like him.
Delicious food. Must try the taramosalata and whole branzino. Yum!
Excellent service, food and venue.

I got the “Diana” salad which consists of argula, walnuts, manouri and glazed pears and dressing. It paired great with a rosé. The service/waiters were attentive and friendly. Prior to seating, they checked our temperature with a remote device. I made reservations for 2 and we were promptly seated. I liked the added touch of olives and warm bread as well. Was there for almost 2 hours and had a great time! I’m plant-based and was impressed with their menu. There were nice options for vegan or gluten-free diners. Glad I went and will go back. The only reason I didnt rate as 5 stars is because I felt they skimped a bit on the pears. I only got 3 pear slices, c’mon guys!
Great food that isn't the typical Greek restaurant fare in all the best ways. Also, the service is amazing!

Just tried this place out, and so glad I did! We sat outside and the vibe was excellent for a breezy, summer afternoon. Great staff service from start to finish. This first time around we tackled the spreads, and small plates section. The Spread sampler, Beet salad, Greek meatballs, Calamari, and Village salad- to name a few. Dishes were fantastic in both taste and presentation, and ingredients were fresh. A gem in River North! Can't wait to come back and try the rest of the menu!
Great that they are open Outside . Food is very good , service excellent, experience was the best. You have to get the Tamara (sic) it’s the fish roe Spread.
One of the Best Restaurants in Chicago. Great tasting  Greek food with an upscale culinary twist. You will love it. The filo dough wrapped prawns are a must. Kataifi Prawns.

The food is greek inspired and I found it just okay. I found some foods like the zucchini chips and saganaki to be very greasy while the grilled octopus was dry and lacking flavor. I did enjoy the gyro and the fries, but overall might need to try again to get a better gauge of quality.  The staff seemed to be very helpful though, so I’m hoping the second go around will be better!

Support this business!! Live nearby, food is great, will come back ASAP!  Also remember order direct on website for hotels and restaurants whenever you can.  Food ordering intermediary websites destroy restaurant margins...
Thank you for an amazing Greek Easter Dinner! The food was delicious. Looking forward to dining-in

The food at Avli is excellent and authentic. The staff is warm and inviting, you immediately feel like family. Their to go orders are just as delicious... generous portions and packaged with care. Thank you, Avli!
The best Greek restaurant in Chicago .
Highly recommend checking out Avli! Amazing food and generous portions. Service was also fantastic!!!
16 dollars lunch special is the best in town

Unpleasant experience.  We were rushed (although we promised to be finished by 7:30 and actually left at 7:15).  Food was disappointing.  Service unfriendly.  An effort by host at the end to compensate by giving us desert, but we were uninterested.  Quite disappointing.
Good Food and Atmosphere!  Try the Saganaki, it was prepared with honey and figs.  Never had it this way and was very tasty!
Food and service we're great, but upstairs room is so loud, you can't hear the person across the table. Annoying disco music playing the entire time we were there. Ambiance is not good.
Did not care for the extreme small type on menu but the food and service were good.
Everything we ordered was fantastic!
Beautiful place with delicious Greek food!
poor service, mediocre food.. very disappointed in this restaurant week experience 😕
We enjoyed our dinner, the portions were a little more tame than the usual Greek restaurant but still very delicious.  The staff was very attentive.

Me and my wife loved this place.  I used to live in Greece and this was a great take on traditional Greek food. Considering everyone there spoke the language means they know the homeland and the food is on far with anything from the village. Highly recommended and the staff is great which is an added bonus.
Excellent dinner! Will def be back!

Their Lincoln Park location has excellent food and service, so I’m guessing the River North location still has a few kinks to work out. Our server recommended a wine they didn’t have and missed the fact that we explained a member of our party had a gluten allergy. They also got one of our orders incorrect and served the food at room temperature. I’ll still go back in the future to give them another chance!
Nice, quaint, quiet! Great service, week night dinner, busy, but not a mad house..

Great experience!!  Table of eight had about ten entrees and shared.  All of them were a little different twist then traditional and were awesome!  Apps were all balanced and enjoyable.  Will be back soon.  Save room for desert.  The ambiance was hip and enjoyable.
excellent! great  food, service, ambience ! will be back very soon.

Been to the original location in winnetka. Although some changes have occurred from the original menu. I feel this place this transcending!!   Made a stop @ the lakeview location as well.  An excellent decision, on my part.  I’ve been waiting for a good Greek restaurant to open up in my neck of the woods (river north).  I find a lot of places especially in Greektown have been subpar!! Not to throw anyone under the bus. But as my palette has graduated from many frequent Greek establishments, that I frequently visit.  I can honestly say this is a go-to.  Some kinks to work out, but it’s understandable as there operations are new!! My experience thus far, has been extraordinary!! From my first drink @ the bar, from our bartender nick, answering questions regarding the menu.  I often do not write reviews, but this place has made a lasting impression on me!! I hope this place  stays as a neighbored staple!! Avli (river north) you ROCK!!
Yeech!  Lukewarm food, not very good, overpriced, small portions. Could be a gem. No reason to even try  this miss.
Amazing service and even better food and Greek wine. River North and Chicago needed this!
Food and service was great. Perfect addition to the neighborhood.

Lovely staff and a very tastefully decorated new restaurant. The food is mediocre and grossly overpriced for what it is. The food was just fair. They have a long way to go if they plan to make it in this neighborhood. It is pretty much a one and done place to try.
